metadata.synopsis: After killing the Murder Tribunal, Dolor turns on our party and starts attacking us.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Use "oe MT_Start", enter the tombstone shop and go down into the Murder Tribunal- Use "oe MT_Dolor_Assault_Cheats" to get Dolor to appear at the Death Knight guarding the courtroom. He will start attacking the Death Knight and will then turn his attention to the Murder Tribunal.- It's best to join this combat and use "killcombat", provided Dolor is still neutral to us.- If Dolor somehow survives the whole ordeal and the Tribunal ends up dead, he will turn on the players and say this AD on his first combat turn.

0.speaker: Meztli
0.text: You were ever so helpful - as thanks, I'll gut you quickly.
